properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      01-38.80S 039-37.83W AND 03-14.23S 037-35.40W.
   B. 25 AND 26 MAR ALONG TRACKLING BETWEEN
      01-29.15S 039-32.15W AND 03-05.58S 037-28.88W.
   C. 27 AND 28 MAR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      01-15.40S 037-25.62W AND 02-56.93S 037-22.37W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 627/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 29 MAR.
